summary: Increases the speed of bolts fired
descriptionHtml:
==============================================================================================================================================
Please Endorse If You Download
======================================================================================================================================
==============
Description
==============
There are 2 versions to this mod, increased speed only, or increased speed and increased time of which arrows stay in players and npc\'s bodies

Each version comes with 4 different speeds, 25%, 50%, 75% and 100% speed increase 

I highly recommend that you add these lines to your Skyrim.ini

f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7

Thanks to Tom2681 for informing me of these

==============
Compatability
==============
This should be compatible with all other mods, if you find it conflicts with another mod, just load this after the conflicting mod.
author: Warlord0012

files.name: Faster Bolts and Increased Stay Time
files.fileName: Faster Bolts and Increased Stay Time-21952-1-0.rar
